name: John Boyce
bio: John is a strategic player known for his sharp putting skills. Off the course, he enjoys fine dining and collecting rare golf balls.
prediction: John is predicted to lead his team to victory with his consistent performance and clutch shots under pressure.

name: Jimmy Boyce
bio: Jimmy, aka 'Duck', is a fearless competitor with a strong drive. When not golfing, he’s often found coaching local youth teams.
prediction: Jimmy’s competitive spirit will shine, but he may need to rein in his aggressive plays to avoid penalties.

name: Eric Hall
bio: Eric is known for his laser-focused shots and incredible composure under pressure.
prediction: Expect Eric to be a key player with several game-changing birdies.

name: John Snow
bio: John’s analytical approach to golf earns him the nickname 'Snowman,' even though he avoids them on the scorecard.
prediction: John’s calculated plays will ensure consistency but may slow down his pace.

name: Brian Cregan
bio: Brian thrives under pressure, particularly when escaping from bunkers.
prediction: Brian’s short game could make or break his performance this outing.

name: Andy McDonald
bio: Andy’s iron play is the stuff of legend, earning him the nickname 'Iron Man.'
prediction: Andy’s precision with his irons will be a game-changer.

name: Dan Hamilton
bio: Dan’s booming drives often leave his opponents in awe.
prediction: Dan’s long game will set up easy birdie opportunities.

name: Chris Troyan
bio: Chris is renowned for his uncanny ability to sink long putts.
prediction: Chris’s putting could single-handedly win his team the outing.

name: Brian Skilton
bio: Brian’s skill with a wedge makes him a dangerous player from 100 yards in.
prediction: Expect Brian to card a few eagles with his precision shots.

name: Steve Higbee
bio: Steve has a reputation for delivering clutch performances when the stakes are high.
prediction: Steve will likely shine in high-pressure situations, clinching key holes.

name: Bill Tuefel
bio: Bill is known for his smooth, effortless swing that delivers consistent accuracy.
prediction: Bill’s relaxed style will keep his team on the fairway all day.

name: Tony Marandola
bio: Tony is a wildcard with a talent for risky, high-reward shots.
prediction: Tony’s bold plays will either secure victory or bring a few surprises.

name: Brian Cusick
bio: Brian grinds through every hole with determination, rarely giving up on a shot.
prediction: Expect Brian to save critical points with his tenacity.

name: Frank O'Neill
bio: Frank keeps his cool under pressure, making him a steady presence on the team.
prediction: Frank will provide stability and confidence during the outing.

name: Brian McCollum
bio: Brian’s steady game minimizes mistakes and keeps his team in contention.
prediction: Brian’s consistency will be the backbone of his team.

name: Nick Markley
bio: Nick shreds through tough courses with ease, using his creativity to navigate hazards.
prediction: Nick’s ingenuity will give his team the edge in tricky spots.

name: Paul Philson
bio: Paul’s power game hammers the ball off the tee, giving his team an advantage in distance.
prediction: Paul’s strength will set up birdie chances on long holes.

name: Mark Rowles
bio: Mark’s approach shots often land within a few feet of the pin.
prediction: Mark will dominate on par-3 holes with his pin-seeking accuracy.

name: Sam Novak
bio: Sam is known for closing out matches with nerves of steel.
prediction: Expect Sam to shine in the final holes of each round.

name: Noel Morning
bio: Noel, a morning person, plays best during early rounds with unmatched focus.
prediction: Noel will set the pace for his team early in the outing.
